title: What Happens with these cores?
body: I have all 3 first strike borders and I still have 38 cores leftover...

replies.body:
Hey BarryButcher,

Save those cores!

Next week, a new disruption cache will be available, and will give you a blueprint of one of the older project skins. If you combine these with 11 project cores, you'll get the skin shard for that blueprint. 

Here's a screenshot of the disruption cache information. 

http://imgur.com/a/5xYbe

Hope that helps. :)
since i only need project Yi... i guess its ok. still going to have a lot left over though. cheers.

Worst case scenario you can get yourself some orange essence! 

I'm sure that there will be some way to use up any project cores remaining. We'll just have to wait and see!
they said they were going to make more content for it later so hang on to them.

You get the first strike borders with the super bundle right?

Not a clue what we are meant to do with the cores.
I have like the blueprint of one of the boxes, but I need three of them to combine and not the cores like the cores say?
